alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Thomas County through 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Levant, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph, penny size hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Colby around 630 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 42 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern Kansas.
